name: Better Facebook - .:OuterSpace:. - 2.0
description: Sleeker and minimalism experience. • NEW!! - REVAMPED COLUMNS (right one actually is visible now, can see trending etc), less bordered columns, made each column adjacent and even/equal, photos in theater mode have a blue glow, NO MORE BROKEN IMAGES! YAY • Drop down navigation menu. • Hover opacity. • Beautiful space chat borders and bubbles. • Beautiful nebula background. • Cute alien cursor. • Bordered posts and menus. See screenshot. I'm not sure if it's just for me, but it loads Facebook faster too.

user.name: alkalaii
user.about: I am a beginner in coding.

additional_info: Like this theme? Donate! 2.0 - ultra optimized, new & better columns, no more circle-y post/column borders, as well as circly chat icons, bye bye circles (it looked weird imo and messed up a lot of things), the chat bubbles are normal as well now, didnt like the faded galaxy look (too myspace 2009 for me tbh), columns are of equal height and margins now aw yiss. the notifications dont make that weird sliding motion anymore, they're just normal but with a slight glow. looks really cool when you have notifications, no more broken images, right column doesnt screw up anymore and not show at all like it used to. blue glow when hovering over a chat message (dunno how to fix it yet but i dont mind it). facebook updated (again) and messed up the bluebar's opacity, cant fix it as of now. 1.9 - chat bgs are easier to differentiate, one is grey and one is blue. both nebulas. 1.8 - chatbar profile pic squares are now circles 1.7 - new chatbar title colors & text bg 1.6 - opacity for chat sidebar, box shadow & border for chat box 1.5 - new color links 1.4 - added drop down menus to leftcol, less clutter and more minimalistic 1.3 - added bg and borders to pagenav 1.2 - new scrollbar 1.1 - added hover opacity to leftcol, rightcolumn, and bluebar, more minimalistic 1.0 - beta release

discussions.name: I can not see the letters when I write messages
